abstract: Epix, the forthcoming premium movie channel from Paramount Pictures, MGM and Lionsgate, has signed Verizon as its first distributor.
snippet: Epix, the forthcoming premium movie channel from Paramount Pictures, MGM and Lionsgate, has signed Verizon as its first distributor.
